messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1302
messages.msgSnippet: ... I agree wholeheartedly.  To be blessed with the opportunity to experience sharing and choosing to rather than feeling a sense of obligation or having to
messages.messageBody:
> Making kids share when they don't want to defeats the purpose, for me,
> of them developing a generous spirit.

I agree wholeheartedly. To be blessed with the opportunity to experience
sharing and choosing to rather than feeling a sense of obligation or having
to are very different experiences with different results. To give with
regret is not a gift.

Thank you for sharing the beautiful writing.
Kay


>
>
> This is the whole thing (because I know somebody will ask):
>
> Be generous in prosperity,
> and thankful in adversity.
> Be fair in judgement,
> and guarded in thy speech,
> Be a lamp unto those who walk
> in darkness, and a home
> to the stranger.
> Be eyes to the blind, and a guiding light
> unto the feet of the erring
> Be a breath of life to the body of
> humankind, a dew to the soil of
> the human heart,
> and a fruit upon the tree of humility.
>
>
>
